name: browser-soap
description: A minimal SOAP client in javascript, so tiny it even runs in browser
author: Johniak <romaniakjan@gmail.com>

scripts.build: bna -f index.js && uglifyjs index.fused.js -b  > browser-soap.js && rm index.fused.js
scripts.build-min: bna -f index.js && uglifyjs index.fused.js -c -m > browser-soap-min.js && rm index.fused.js
